instruction: What metric was chosen and how far can this metric go in the related research for classifying soybean based on protein content?
Output:

The global accuracy measures the overall correctness of the classification model, while the kappa index takes into account the agreement between the predicted classifications and the actual classifications, considering the possibility of agreement by chance alone.

In the research, the global accuracy of the method was reported as 0.83 for the training set and 0.81 for the test set. The corresponding kappa indices were 0.66 and 0.61, respectively. These metrics indicate the performance of the sensor in classifying soybean based on protein content.
